榯字的基本解释

榯
shí
（树木）直立。
支持门枢的木头：落榯。

榯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shí］
［《廣韻》市之切，平之，禪。］
树木直立貌。

榯字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　榯； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页544第18
【唐韻】【集韻】?市之切，音時。【玉篇】樹木立也。【宋玉·高唐賦】其始出也嚉兮若松榯。【註】直豎貌。　又【類篇】落榯，持門樞。

榯字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
榯字的起名意思

暂无。

榯
Basic explanation of words
榯
shí
(Trees) stand upright.
Wood supporting the hinge: Luomu.
榯
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［shí］
["Guangyun" City Zhiqi, Pingzhi, Zen. ]
The trees stand upright.
榯
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　榯; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 544 Page 18
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? The cut of the city, sound time. [Jade articles] Trees stand. [Song Yu·Gao Tang Fu] The beginning of its appearance is also like a pine. [Note] Upright appearance.　[Classes] Falling down, holding the door hinge.
